text.help:
§a{prefix} help §f- §aDisplay help message
§a{prefix} run <command name> §f- §aExecute command
§a{prefix} reload §f- §aReload plugin
§a{prefix} list §f- §aList all commands
text.welcome: Welcome to use ConvinceTool plugin, type §a{prefix} help§f to display help message
text.MCDR_help: A command plugin designed for this server

message.command_no_permission: You don't have permission to use this command
